titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of truck tires entered on or after January 6, 2005, and on or before June 21, 2005.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of, and refund of any duties and interest paid on, certain entries of truck tires.
